description: This service retrieves basic address details associated with a given phone number. It provides categorized address information and first-seen dates, enabling alternate data-based verification workflows.
llm_summary: Phone to Address Basic service maps a phone number to associated addresses, categorized by type and including first-seen dates. Useful for alternate data verification and compliance workflows.
use_cases: Retrieve address details linked to a phone number for onboarding workflows.
Support compliance and fraud prevention by verifying address information.
Enable alternate data-based KYC processes in financial services and insurance.
Verify address history for identity verification workflows in government and private sectors.

request_schema.description: Mobile number to map to address details.
User consent for accessing address data

response_schema.description: Overall status of the API response
Unique request ID generated by the API
HTTP status code for the service
Address data associated with the phone number

phone.description: Phone number linked to the addresses

addressCount.description: Number of addresses associated with the phone number

addresses.description: List of addresses associated with the phone number

category.description: Category of the address (e.g., ECOM, BFSI, OTHERS)

firstSeenDate.description: Date when the address was first seen
